issue.body:

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Annoyance) [https://app.bionic-reading.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fapp.bionic-reading.com%2F) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/EvMPMHj.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v4.1.53 Browser: | Chrome Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard URL Tracking,
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Annoyances:
AdGuard Annoyances

Language-specific:
AdGuard Russian

comment.body:
I propose:
```adblock
app.bionic-reading.com##.MuiDialog-root.MuiModal-root:has(#cookie_svg__a)
```
The `:has` is required as to avoid selecting other dialogs (i.e. the EULA). Blocking the cookie banner does prevent the "how to use" from showing, as it seems to only show when the cookie banner is closed.
